GS030-CSS-CACHE.rule: CSS files should use cache bustable URLs.

GS035-CONTENT-0.rule: Replace the content zero hack with the {{image}} helper

GS020-INDEX-REQ.rule: A template file called index.hbs must be present.

GS020-POST-REQ.rule: A template file called post.hbs must be present.

GS020-DEF-REC.rule: Provide a default layout template called default.hbs.

GS030-ASSET-REQ.rule: Assets such as CSS & JS must use the {{asset}} helper
GS030-ASSET-REQ.details: The listed files should be included using the {{asset}} helper.
